definitions.definition: The act of obstructing , or state of being obstructed.
Something which obstructs or impedes, either intentionally or unintentionally
The condition of having the natural powers obstructed in their usual course; the arrest of the vital functions; death .

main_definition: The act of obstructing , or state of being obstructed.

The condition of having the natural powers obstructed in their usual course; the arrest of the vital functions; death .
